title: How to deal with Yasuo
body:
Hit "Esc" button
Press "Exit Game" 
Go up to a wall and bang your heads against it, then cry till the ocean dries out.

replies.body:
Ranged auto attack his shield, wait 1 second, use burst and walk away before he gap closes through a minion.

Don't do this when he has his tornado ready.

Don't be in the middle of the lane when he is able to Q the tornado.

Yasuo can Q faster with higher attack speed.

People still complain about Yasuo?

I thought people banned him to make sure their team doesn't pick him and feed.

LOL! Yasuo is one of the weakest champions right now. Check out his win rate and his KDA, they are at the bottom.

How to deal with him? Stop sitting in one place, move around.
Just pick Tryndamere. In a skill matchup, you win mid-lategame against almost anyone 1v1.

> Just pick Tryndamere. In a skill matchup, you win mid-lategame against almost anyone 1v1.

except rengar, kite with bola, counter ult to hide, leap qq w e once ult ends.
